text: Develop and maintain scalable applications using Python, Java, and cloud platforms. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design APIs and optimize performance.
Analyze large datasets to extract insights, build machine learning models, and communicate findings to stakeholders using visualization tools.
Create interactive and responsive web applications using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frameworks like React.
Implement CI/CD pipelines, monitor cloud infrastructure, and automate deployments to ensure reliability and scalability.
